segments.text: It's a perfect day for swimming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to the beech . How about coming with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! I love swimming . Besides , I need a tan for Hill â€™ s party ..
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't forget the sun block lotion . You don't want a sunburn , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2
